targets.query: SELECT max("value") FROM "batterySoc" WHERE ("value"::field < 101) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT min("value") FROM "batterySoc" WHERE ("value"::field < 101) AND ("value"::field > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)
SELECT value as "Erzeugt von PV" FROM "pvMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag
SELECT value as "Zugekauft" FROM "gridMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag
SELECT value * (-1) as "Haus" FROM "homeMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag
SELECT value * (-1) as "Garage" FROM "loadpoint1MonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag
SELECT value * (-1) as "Stellplatz" FROM "loadpoint2MonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag
SELECT value * (-1) as "Eingespeist" FROM "feedInMonthlyEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "month"::tag
SELECT max("value") FROM "batterySoc" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT min("value") FROM "batterySoc" WHERE $timeFilter AND value  > 0 GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
